results.title: Pharmacotherapy for stroke prevention in nonvalvular atrial fibrillation: current strategies and future directions.
results.text_hl: Non-anticoagulant drugs, such as @CHEMICAL_Colchicine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003078 @@@colchicine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Dronedarone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077764 @@@dronedarone@@@, also being investigated to reduce the burden of @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@NVAF@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Embolic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083262 @@@cardioembolic stroke@@@.

citations.NLM: Gómez-Outes A, Suárez-Gea ML, Pérez-Cabeza AI, García-Pinilla JM. Pharmacotherapy for stroke prevention in nonvalvular atrial fibrillation: current strategies and future directions. Expert Opin Pharmacother. 2022 Dec;23(17):1941-1955. PMID: 36398362
